experiences.detail:
Main responsibilities:
- Leading a developer team.
- Solving project problems.
- Building project architecture.
- Building a lending system that works with Coinbase cryptocurrency wallet using the Laravel PHP framework.
- Working with many cool technologies and frameworks including Nodejs, Vue JS, MongoDB, Redis, DeepStream,... in a project of Crypto-Portfolio. - Training team members.

* Main responsibilities:
- Studying many experiences in Programming Window Application. - Working with WCF Service and WonderwareSystem. - Making Application with WPF Control. - Setting up an environment for testing and deployment.

Main responsibilities:
- Working with Angularjs, Bootstrap to design Responsive Web. - Designing the architecture and building adatabase system for mobile applications.
- Working with Node.js and Socket.io to build Realtime Back-end systems for game Champion-dash of Redbull Vietnam. - Working with ASP.NET MVC and WEB API 2 to build a back-end system for the mobile app and company products.
